Class TicTacToe

java.lang.Object
MiniPlay.Model.TicTacToe
public class TicTacToe extends Object
Manages the Tic Tac Toe Game Handles the board, moves, and win/draw/lose

    • placeMove

      public boolean placeMove(int row, int col, char symbole)
      Place a move on the board for player
      Parameters:
      row - - row index
      col - - column index
      symbol - - 'X' or 'O' return true - move is value, otherwise false

    • checkWin

      Check if player won
      Returns:
      true - if there is a winner
